name: Google Remix
description: ##########// PLEASE UPDATE TO THE NEWEST VERSION//########## Check out my other Spotify Remix Theme Spotify Redone A complete overhaul of the google search webpage (Maps youtube will be there in future) Again tons of animations for the fancy people. *custom made wallpaper *visited mark *custom slider *tons of animations and much more .
additional_info:
##########// PLEASE UPDATE TO THE NEWEST VERSION //##########


This is the first version, there might be some bugs, but those will be fixed in future since i'm using this theme too, so otherwhise i had to look at the bugs the whole time. So make sure to come back and update the style.



Stuff to do:

**Adjust the theme to google site updates
**Bugfixes
**Some elements are still missing Background colors
**making it even more fancy

Coming soon stuff:
**Maps
**G-Mail
**Other (Youtube in the future)

v 1.00 - Release

v 1.01 - 
* Added an awesome animation for the searchbar text
* Some bugfixes

v 1.02 - 
* FIXED GOOGLE MAPS
* Fixed slide in animation with widgets

v.1.03 -
* Changed visuals
* edited the widget info

v.1.04 -
* Changed the speaker icon to a pulsing circle (very fancy)

v. 1.05 -
* Apps Menu patched

v. 1.06
* Fixed background on result container

v.1.07
* Quickfix container names

discussions.name: Hey please make a youtube remix.
